definition: Systematic approaches or step-by-step processes for accomplishing tasks or solving problems.

positive_examples: Follow the standard operating procedure for equipment maintenance.
The scientific method requires careful observation and hypothesis testing.
Our company has established protocols for handling customer complaints.
The recipe provides a detailed method for baking sourdough bread.
Emergency evacuation procedures must be practiced regularly.
The algorithm sorts the data in ascending order efficiently.
negative_examples: The theory of evolution explains species development over time.
Democracy is based on the principle of majority rule.
Gravity is a fundamental force in the universe.
The painting depicts a beautiful landscape scene.
She believes strongly in environmental conservation.
Mathematics involves abstract concepts like infinity.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Theory, Principle, Belief, Concept
